sentences.en: BAILE IS ALONG LASTING SLPPERY LUBRICANT, IT IS A SUPER SOFT WATERSOLUBLE, GREASE - LESSCOLORLESS ODORLESS.
sentences.cn: 产品名称)是一种耐久性的滑动润滑剂,它是超轻柔水溶性, 无油污, 无色,无异味.

sentences.en: Character: White or light yellow powder, slightly salty, odorless, hygroscopic property.
sentences.cn: 性状: 白色或微黄色粉末, 略带咸味, 无臭, 有饮湿性.

sentences.en: Chemical Property: White powder, nontoxic and odorless.
sentences.cn: 化学性质: 白色粉末, 无毒,无嗅.

sentences.en: Evaporation. No cracking on substrates . Good physical properties. Steam resistance . Odorless.
sentences.cn: 自然干, 防破裂,延展性好, 耐蒸煮,低气味.

sentences.en: Gaseous helium is inert, colorless, odorless, non corrosive, and nonflammable.
sentences.cn: 气态氦极不活泼, 无色, 无嗅, 无腐蚀性, 不可燃.

sentences.en: Hydrogen is a corlorless, odorless gas.
sentences.cn: 氢气是一种无色、无味的气体。

sentences.en: Install a CO detector to alert you of the presence of the deadly, odorless, colorless gas.
sentences.cn: 安装一氧化碳检测器来警告是否存在这种致命的、无色无味的气体。

sentences.en: It exists in this world colorless, shapeless, soundless, odorless, and painless.
sentences.cn: 它存在于世,无色, 无形, 无声, 无嗅和无痛.

sentences.en: Learning how to safely harness the invisible, odorless resource took some time. Many a building was blown to matchwood because of leaking gas. In 1908, a mattress factory exploded.
sentences.cn: 学习如何安全使用这种无形、无味的资源需要时间。很多建筑因为漏气而被炸成碎片。1908年，一家床垫厂发生爆炸。

sentences.en: Liquid nitrogen is inert, colorless, odorless, non corrosive, nonflammable and extremely cold.
sentences.cn: 液态氮是惰性的, 无色, 无嗅, 无腐蚀性, 不可燃,温度极低.

sentences.en: Low - nitrogen combustion technology, smokeless and odorless, without harmful gas.
sentences.cn: 无二次污染低氮燃烧技术, 无烟,无臭, 无有害气体.

sentences.en: Many smokeless, odorless incinerators for disposal of animal carcasses are available commercially.
sentences.cn: 市场上有许多种处理尸体的无烟、 无臭的焚尸炉出售。

sentences.en: Methane is colorless and odorless gas.
sentences.cn: 甲烷是无色无味的气体.

sentences.en: Nitrogen trifluoride ( NF 3 ) is a toxic, colorless, odorless, nonflammable, oxidizing compressed gas.
sentences.cn: 三氟化氮 ( NF3 ) 是有毒 、 无色 、 无嗅 、 不可燃的氧化性压缩气体.

sentences.en: Products look smooth, odorless and tasteless, size and stability.
sentences.cn: 制品外观光滑 、 无臭无味 、 尺寸稳定.

sentences.en: Pure water is colorless, odorless and tasteless.
sentences.cn: 纯净水是无色 、 无嗅、无味的.

sentences.en: Smokeless and odorless . The operation cost is low . 2.
sentences.cn: 无烟、无臭、无二次公害、干燥兼焚烧、运转费低.

sentences.en: Water is a transparent, odorless, tasteless liquid.
sentences.cn: 水是一种无色无味的透明液体.
